title: Ariana Grande - The Way (Live from London)
description:
The official performance of “The Way” Live from London by Ariana Grande. Listen to & download the Yours Truly: Tenth Anniversary album here: https://arianagrande.lnk.to/yourstruly10yr

►Shop Merch: https://arianagrande.lnk.to/shop
